Comment: I’d have to do more looking into what Reagan did to figure out how analogous it is to this conflict. I was skimming some stuff online and he did a couple of UN votes and some temporary holding of aid that was predictably pretty flaccid and didn’t have a ton of impact. The big incident with the phone call was about a conflict in Beirut I guess, but I’m not sure if Reagan single handedly stopped that like some people are suggesting or if he only played a minor role. The Beirut conflict also may not have been at the same scale and intensity as the conflict in Gaza too for all I know. Israel really doesn’t seem like it wants to back down at all now after the 10/7 massacre and now that they’ve got a far right government that seems like it wants to take land in Gaza or god knows what else. This shit is complex and both sides are dug in, I doubt a phone call is going to solve it.
